name: Douglas Clarke
personality: Patient and precise, Quinton is a disciplined soldier who takes pride in his work.
story: Quinton has always been interested in military tactics and strategy. He joined the army at the age of 20 after completing his studies in military science. He has served in several peacekeeping missions in different countries and has gained extensive combat experience. After years of service, Quinton decided to settle down and got married to his long-time girlfriend. He now balances his duty as a soldier and his responsibilities as a husband.
